nodes.text: Vergesso III, also Vergesso Belt III and Vergesso Field III, was one of five valueless asteroid rings orbiting the yellow star Lybeya in the Outer Rim Territories' Lybeya system. The five asteroid fields, which comprised the larger Vergesso Asteroids, were the sundered remains of planets, created by some unknown force, possibly an encounter with a rogue star. Vergesso III contained three major planetoids, including the giant asteroid Vergesso Prime, home to Vergesso Base, a major shadowport.
